name: Rygar: The Legendary Adventure
description:
The Titans have attacked Argus. Rygar, armed with the Diskarmor, must stop the Titans and restore peace.

This title has been converted from the original PlayStation®2 version to the PS3™ system. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation®2 version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation®2 peripherals, therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.
